summary: A close look at Bo Jackson, a sports hero of mythical proportions, and how the "Bo Knows" Nike campaign shaped how the world perceived him. Without winning a Super Bowl or World Series, or ... See full summary Â»
cast: James Andrews|Dickie Atchison|Hal Baird|Brian Bosworth|Terry Brasseale|George Brett|Steve Carlton|Thomas Clarke|Pat Dye|Boomer Esiason|Mike Greenberg|Mark Gubicza|Tinker Hatfield|Mark Heisler|David Housel|Bo Jackson|Bomani Jones|Dick Kaegel|Chuck Klosterman|Howie Long|Lynn Merritt|Curt Nelson|Rick Reuschel|Harold Reynolds|Jim Riswold|Jeremy Schaap|Art Stewart|Mark Thomashow|Ray Van Ness III|Michael Weinreb|Marcellus Wiley|Wade Boggs|Bob Boone|Bo Diddley|Jim Everett|Kirk Gibson|Wayne Gretzky|Michael Jordan|Spike Lee|Bob Ley|Don Mattingly|John McEnroe|Mark McGwire|Kirby Puckett|Ronald Reagan|Cal Ripken|Vin Scully
title: You Don't Know Bo: The Legend of Bo Jackson
